data.author: Chris Grosser
data.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.

data.author: Spryte Loriano
data.quote: Every great story on the planet happened when someone decided not to give up, and kept going no matter what.

data.author: Charles Darwin
data.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.

data.author: Leonardo DiCaprio
data.quote: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.

data.author: Ryan Nicodemus
data.quote: Temporary habits are almost as bad as no habits at all.

data.author: Joshua Fields Millburn
data.quote: Many things are both useful and dangerous. An automobile is useful; an automobile is dangerous. Likewise for nostalgia.

data.author: The Minimalists
data.quote: If we are constantly consuming, then we are not creating.

data.author: Joshua Fields Millburn
data.quote: Never leave the scene of a good idea without taking action.

data.author: Sheryl Sandberg
data.quote: If you’re offered a seat on a rocket ship, don’t ask what seat! Just get on.

data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
data.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

data.author: Anonymous (Ancient Indian Proverb)
data.quote: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.

data.author: The Minimalists
data.quote: However we spend our time—be it surfing Facebook or exercising at the gym—those are our actual priorities.

data.author: Ryan Nicodemus
data.quote: Distraction is a form of procrastination.

data.author: The Minimalists
data.quote: You needn’t be defined by your past. And certainly, your future does not have to look like your past, unless you allow it to.

data.author: John Sonmez
data.quote: Trust the process.

data.author: Joshua Fields Millburn
data.quote: Letting go of control is the best way to regain total control.

data.author: The Minimalists
data.quote: Criticism is inevitable—unless you do nothing important with your life.

data.author: The Minimalists
data.quote: If you’re not growing, you’re dying.
